name: DEADLY DEAD
description:
Deadly Dead

In Deadly Dead players have to fight with thousands of zombies with powerful weapons. In this game players has to fight zombies to get out of the city alive. The common zombies are easy to kill but the strong zombies are very hard kill. A lot of ammunition is required to kill Strong zombies. There are some zombies which will keep on regenerating and they are impossible to kill. In the end players have to face very strong and huge zombies who are bigger then buildings. The game will get harder as the players reach new levels. In this game players will get many weapons to fight against zombies like machine gun,AK-47,mini-gun,Uzi,gernades,etc. In this game there are beautiful sound effects and environment. Each level is different from the previous one and there are more zombies in higher levels.

System Requirements

  • Operating System: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • CPU: Intel Core i5
  • RAM: 4GB
  • Setup Size: 1.26GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 2.00GB
